#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
string s,s1;
int main() {
	long long int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--) {
		long long int a[2]={0};
		s.clear();
		s1.clear();
		cin>>s>>s1;
		long long int n = s.size();
		for(long long int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			if(s[i] !=s1[i]) a[s[i]-'0']++;
 		}
 		long long int q = min(a[0],a[1]);
 		if((!a[0] && s.find('0')==string::npos) || (!a[1] && s.find('1')==string::npos))  cout<<"Unlucky Chef"<<endl;
 		else cout<<"Lucky Chef"<<endl<<max(a[0],a[1])<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
